titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on Tacrolimus in bulk or measured dose form subject to approval by the Food and Drug Administration.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/24/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on tacrolimus in measured dose and bulk form.
